column4: or when your not on a unvirsity network or accessing university material
i <3 split pane in dolphin. i think you can just click the middle button on the right
you know minimize, maximize/restore, close...?
i dont use a normal window manager so i cant really try though
but atlast there are no minimize, maximize, close buttons
its full screen with no titlebar, started the menus
oh...i dont see a fullscreen option in any of the menus. is your window manager crashed?
doubtfull, I can tab about of it and see other apps and they work fine, even rebooted
:-/ this reminds me of a bug i saw filed where firefox would do the same thing
but i think the firefox thing only happened when firefox and compiz intersected and only for a handful of people
i assume youre using kwin?
good question, pretty sure, I'm running doliphin in a gnome environment, but I don't think that would matter any
are you using kubuntu or are you using dolphin in ubuntu?
ok then its either metacity or compiz. is it composited?
this sounds like youve found another piece of that annoying compiz bug
haha oh joy
thanks for the tibit, I think I know how to fix it
nkwith ff, youd hit f11 twice, i thi
with ff youd hit f11 twice i think*
